title: Attack on Titan
description: Humans face extinction by Titans. Eren Yeager vows revenge after witnessing devastation.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori joins a secret jujutsu sorcerer school after swallowing a powerful cursed object.

title: Death Note
description: Light Yagami gains a notebook that can kill and decides to rid the world of criminals.

title: Weathering with You
description: A group of friends discover time travel, but changing the past brings dark consequences.

title: Your Name
description: Two strangers mysteriously swap bodies and form a unique bond across time and space.

title: Suzume no Tojimari
description: A group of friends discover time travel, but changing the past brings dark consequences.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro becomes a demon slayer after his family is killed and his sister is turned into a demon.

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage of his village.

title: Naruto Shippuden
description: Naruto returns after years of training to combat new threats and rescue his friend Sasuke.

title: Black Clover
description: Asta, born without magic, strives to become the Wizard King in a world dominated by magic.

title: Mieruko Chan
description: A girl who can see horrifying ghosts pretends not to notice them to survive daily life.

title: One Punch Man
description: Saitama can defeat anyone with a single punch but struggles to find a worthy opponent.

title: Dr. Stone
description: After humanity is petrified, Senku awakens to rebuild civilization using science.

title: Dragon Ball
description: Young Goku sets out on adventures, collecting Dragon Balls and growing as a martial artist.

description: A group of friends discover time travel, but changing the past brings dark consequences.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: Kaneki becomes half-ghoul after a fateful encounter and struggles between human and monster.

title: Your Lie in April (Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso)
